participants.name: Karen
participants.validation_reason: Likely a real customer based on the 'client' role

BUSINESS CONTEXT.Current challenges/pain points: Inability to choose current company on LinkedIn when adding candidates to PCR

key_quotes: It won't let me choose their current company on LinkedIn. It used to do that.
If you turn that off so it's gray, like usually you want all of those gray. If you slide that so it's gray, what that will do is let you either create or pick a company.
Definitely don't do basic mode. If it was up to me, I'd take that one out completely. That's for the people that want things to just be super fast and with no review or it's just ads.

If the company is already found in your database as an exact match, hover on that card and use the checkbox. So that way you're not making any changes to the company by what it's reading from the profile.

qa_pairs.question: Are you familiar with this issue where I can't choose the current company on LinkedIn when using PCR capture?
qa_pairs.answer: Yeah, it could be just a setting at the top. When you click on the extension at the top right of your browser, that's going to pop up all the links or sites that it supports. At the very bottom right, is basic mode off? Like, is it showing gray or blue?

qa_pairs.question: How do you spell your last name?

semantic_themes: Technical issue resolution with PCR capture and LinkedIn integration
Importance of correct settings in recruitment software for accurate data capture
Client support and troubleshooting for long-term users
